name: Puree of Yams
keywords: gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, heavy cream, milk, yams, side dish
recipeIngredient: 4 yams or sweet potatoes, about 2 pounds

recipeInstructions.text: Place yams in a saucepan and add cold water to cover. Bring to the boil and cook 30 minutes. Drain.
When yams are cool enough to handle peel them. Cut yams into 1-inch cubes and put them through food mill or potato ricer.
Put potatoes into a skillet and add butter, cream and milk. Heat thoroughly, stirring.
